title: The Psychology of Outrage with Dr Patrick Lockwood
description:
Dr Patrick Lockwood and I discuss outrage on social media, particularly on platforms like twitter, where angry posts are the quickest way to garner likes. We discuss themes in his book "The Fear Problem: How Technology and Culture Have Hijacked Our Minds and Lives," as I try to understand our propensity towards outrage

Find Patrick's book The Fear Problem: How Technology and Culture Have Hijacked Our Minds and Lives here: http://www.patricklockwoodhealing.com/books.html
Follow Patrick on twitter here: @PsychPLockwood

Follow me:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
